notify.greenzoneEnter: You have entered a Green Zone and certain actions have been disabled
notify.greenzoneExit: You have exited a Green Zone and all actions have been restored

menu.title: Create Green Zone
menu.blipNameDescription: The name of the Green Zone on the map
menu.displayTextDescription: Text to display on everyone's screen in this zone
menu.displayTextColorDescription: The HTML color code of the text displayed
menu.displayTextPositionDescription: The position on the screen for the text
menu.blipIDDescription: The sprite ID to display on the map
menu.blipColorDescription: The blip color for the above sprite

confirm.title: Confirm Action
confirm.content: Are you sure you want to delete your Green Zone?
